Class RadarMerchant

extends Merchant
    Represents a Radar Merchant
    Author:
    Ansen

      Returns the price of an Radar Merchant at specified level
      void reveal(int level, Board b, Tile t)
      Ability of an Radar Merchant to reveal more tiles around them than an average merchant, as the Radar Merchant's level rises, so does the amount of revealed tiles around them

    • Method Detail

      • reveal

        public void reveal(int level,
                   Board b,
                   Tile t)
        Ability of an Radar Merchant to reveal more tiles around them than an average merchant, as the Radar Merchant's level rises, so does the amount of revealed tiles around them
        Parameters:
        level - of the Radar Merchant
        b - board that is being affected
        t - tile that is being revealed
